articles.title: Sickle cell disease - BayStateBanner
articles.description: Sickle cell disease is more common among people of color, particularly African Americans. The survival rate of SCD has increased over the years largely due to the development of improved medications, such as hydroxyurea.
articles.content: By 2006,universal newborn screening was in place in all 50 states, Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands. Within 48 hours of birth a few drops of blood from the infants heel undergo tests for sever… [+8055 chars]
